definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: swath, row of fallen grain (hay, as Mishn., acc. to Vogelstein:l. c. 74 f. (who is then compelled to rd. [[עׂמֶר]] Mic 4:12), cf. Syr. 9miyr grass, Schwally:Idiot. 69);—Am 2:13 (on cart), Je 9:21 (falling behind reaper), Mic 4:12 (brought to threshing-floor), Zec 12:6 (inflammable).
